website_summaries.verdict: The best pick for those looking for a low priced detector with a lot of the bells and whistles usually found in a more expensive model.
pros: Looks great and is very compact
Offers features such as voice mode and train detection at a great price
cons: Some buyers say the range for this option isn't great
Not as effective against laser guns
Some complaints over false alerts, particularly in city and highway driving

customer_reviews.title: It is always right!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and put one of these in every car you own. IT IS ALWAYS RIGHT. I travel 150 miles a day for work and go through three counties. The cops are merciless in New York and this little Cobra has saved my as EVERY SINGLE TIME. You can't see them when the alarm goes off but when you do, you are so grateful that you spent the money on this machine. AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Val

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself in less than 15 mins!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to pay $500 for a radar/laser detector. I got this and plugged in into the "fast car" I drive (camaro), which the POLICE love to pull me over in. Mind you I have gotten 3 tickets since I bought this car in April 2015!!!! So, I plugged it up and just run down the road. Well, no kidding it saved me 2 tickets right then. Cops were hiding out in places they usually don't, this detector gave me enough time to slow my speed. I am more than happy and will be buying at least another for the mustang! LOL! Buy it , It will save you the hassle of tickets, time and money....
customer_reviews.author: ERNurse

customer_reviews.title: Does not give 360 degree radar protection! Yellow lights ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not give 360 degree radar protection! Yellow lights DO NOT SHINE bright enough to be seen in sunny weather. (Note sunny at 60 degrees in Shitcago, IL.) Volume at max can NOT BE HEARD if window is open or radio is on. Can only detect radar head on. Many false signals at x and k band Wish I kept my whistler cr 90 detector. Beats this hands down
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Range
customer_reviews.text: Much better range than expected. Attached to dash with Velcro, so no suction rating. More false triggering than I would like, but has saved me on several occasions. I live within 5 miles of a State Patrol academy, and when new troopers are unleashed, they're eager to show their ability. This unit puts me on a much more even footing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Oogmuk

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from tickets
customer_reviews.text: My story the first night I had this thing I was coming home from work and the ka begins going haywire and I hit the brakes 10 seconds later a police officer rounds the corner I was doing 65 and got it down to 45 before he even saw me this thing paid for it self with the first night I’ve had it I mean sometime it does give off false alerts but that’s expected I just learn where the false alarms come from and that it doesn’t freak me out so much but this product is a very reliable scanner I know I’ll be using this for the rest of my life thank you cobra
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W

customer_reviews.title: Too many false alarms.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this detector for two years. It will warn you of radar but has many false alarms that make it very unreliable. It appears that many of these false aiarms are set off by nearby vehicles with gps tracking, such as Onstar. I’m shopping for a more reliable detector now.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Bracket is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The bracket that came with this unit is wrong. It will not lock into place with the traditional snap you hear. You don't even have to hold the release button on the unit to remove it. If you take off too fast it will remove itself. I hope Beach Camera can supply the right one.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good detector
customer_reviews.text: The Cobra XRS9470 works as advertised. Just used it on a 500 mile round trip and it seemed to function as stated in the instruction book. There was a little programing required to get it to do what I wanted it to do but was easy to do following the instructions. A very good detector for $60. My only complaint is that the font in the instruction booklet is so darn small one needs a magnifying glass to read it even in bright daylight. A real pain in the butt if one had to look up what button changes what function and you don't happen to have a magnifying glass in the glove box. Regardless, I would recommend the detector.
customer_reviews.author: rnldlbl

customer_reviews.title: Cobra radar detector
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector performs perfectly for my needs and comes at a great price. I do not speed or drive recklessly but am tired of being pulled over for small infractions just because I wasn't paying attention at the moment. Ticketing drivers now seems to be a favorite revenue generator for law enforcement. Well I've been harassed long enough and since getting this radar detector I'm always alert and paying attention whenever cops are around hunting for hapless victims. Just need to adjust detection and volume settings so it's not too loud and annoying or constantly going off while driving In the city. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Don't get caught with one of these in Virginia
customer_reviews.text: Def works. Has gotten me out of multiple speeding tickets. I did get 1 ticket tho for actually having one of these while passing through the state of VA. Apparently they're illegal there.
customer_reviews.author: Eneida Torres Withers

customer_reviews.title: No voice  alerts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had quite a few different Cobra radar models and I am not very impressed with this one. I initially thought that it had a voice alert which it doesn't and it always seems to have only one tone when it alerts to possible radar. It doesn't recognize emergency vehicles like ambulances and fire trucks as some models do. While driving in the city, there is little early warning when police cars are around and I can only hope that when in the highway mode it performs better when I am on the open road. I also don't see it switching bands and it seems stuck on only one mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its alright but goes off way too much when it doesnt need to. DONT BUY FROM ELECTRONIC EXPRESS
customer_reviews.text: works alright but goes off way too much when it doesnt need too. its ok for the price but my $20 whistler that i bought at the flee market is 10x better and i use that in my car still and this one in my plow truck. dont buy it from ELECTRONIC EXPRESS when i filed for a return they never got back to me or answered my message. dont recommend this radar unless you can get one cheap for like 35 bucks or less
customer_reviews.author: Candido V

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: As long as you turn off the x band. The K band goes off often which is store doors and 18 wheelers, some of them. The Ka band is the cops, that I pay attention to. It's not the best detector but its enough to keep you out of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: A Speedy Review
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in a timely manner and i used it around the neighborhood with no problems except false alerts in construction zones which is pretty much normal. I just used it on a 2 month cross country trip where I logged in 10,200 miles and not 1 speeder. Of course I didn't use it in Washington DC or Virginia where it's illegal. The detector works well and I'm quite satisfied with it and the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Justdroppedin

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I know Cobras aren't the best radar detectors on the market, but for around $115 this was a good value to me. When I got it mounted in my truck, I spent about 15 minutes reading through the manual to get the compass calibrated and all the radar setting to my liking. Once that was done, it has worked very well for me. I have only used Cobra radar detectors in my vehicles and this is my 4th model so I haven't been exposed to the other brands, but for this price point the radar detector has a lot to offer and so far I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: This certainly gets the job done; did not need to spend any more money. Plenty of settings and indicators for different types of radar. Has never failed to detect radar or laser, and easily works half-a-mile out even through hills and mountains, where I normally drive. POP mode is VERY sensitive (as the manual says), and will get set off by newer cars with blind spot detectors or active cruise control (GMCs and Kias being the biggest culprits). Other than being in a parking lot near a supermarket with automatic doors, I get almost no false alarms. I recommend the city mode for urban areas. While it slightly reduces range, it also reduces false alerts.
customer_reviews.author: tlking4

customer_reviews.title: good detector for the price...
customer_reviews.text: This detector looks good and has a compact no-frills design. You have to read the manual and figure out how to turn off the x-band, set up auto-mute, etc. to get the best experience from it. I had to get used to the "1 through 5" warning level since my Bell had a "1 through 9" level which was nicer. After disabling X-band it let off fewer false alarms. Not sure if the "S" safety alert works though - it seems like the "K" band also picks up the safety alert alarm. It has a pretty decent range except on hills - as I'm guessing most radar detectors probably don't do well on hills.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for unpopulated areas!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my drive to work through small towns. In the city it constantly goes off due to automated doors and such, making it impossible to know what's a patrolman. Also some newer cars have radar on them, so you get a lot of false readings. But for me it works great but my situation is getting more rare. As more vehicles that use radar hit the roads, these detectors will become useless.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron B Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The only problem is the Velcro pulls off ...
customer_reviews.text: For the features it has you would expect to pay double the price. Works great. The only problem is the Velcro pulls off the dash to easily so I stapled a strip to my dash cloth protector and it works fine. You only need one strip and you can just use the edge for easy removal. Just put your finger on the piece attached to the dash. Same method I use for my dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Junk Critic

customer_reviews.title: Ticket Free HA
customer_reviews.text: I found out from an honest person at Cobra that all these unit have the same range. The only difference is the "FLUFF" items like voice and lights. This unit has detected the "other" guy from distance over hills and around curves. The only problem I have is their mounting devices. The suction cups are very poor and do not hold up well under prolonged heat of inside the windshield. And no I am not going to take down each time. I'll forget and get a ticket. Great unit especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DStarr

customer_reviews.title: terrible, false positives EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: terrible, false positives EVERYWHERE. if you're going to get a radar detector get the top of the line ones. cheap ones are a waste of time and money and you end up buying a high end one later on if you're serious about using one.
customer_reviews.author: TheThing

customer_reviews.title: it is worse than my old detector in this aspect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade for a 25 year Old Uniden detector, that still works. It does work well on Highways, detecting up to half a mile away. It does however beep constantly, it is worse than my old detector in this aspect. It will instantly jump to alert level 5 for no reason. I would not recommend this detector. Only reason I gave it 2 stars is because it works decent on the interstate.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Effective! Saved me 3 times!
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector saved me 3 times so far and thus definitely worth the investment. Features: - Highway or city mode - Auto mute (very useful because the volume will automatically lower so it not so annoying) - Intelli-mute (not sure how to use this) - 360 degree radar detection The only one thing I don't like about this product is the clear suctions helps attach the device to your windshield don't always attach that easy.
customer_reviews.author: DoItForDummies

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No tickets in 3 yrs
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No tickets in 3 yrs. (this is a replacement, other one was stolen). Have used this particular unit for over 8 yrs. Have had to replace the widow suction cup bracket.
customer_reviews.author: BlueTurtle

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than a year. Even tried using a different power cord and still didn't work. In the time I had it, it did work pretty well and it did save me from time to time from parked cars that I didnt see. Just wished it lasted longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Cobra XRS9770, a great little unit!
customer_reviews.text: A nice radar detector. Has worked fine for me so far with little if any error. Had to turn the POP mode off though. Have to use these with common sense as they are not a license to exceed the speed limit. The windshield mount works well and has a quick release to remove the unit. Good audio and visual warnings. Intellimute works very well to prevent annoying noise! It's already saved me a few tickets and paid for itself. For the price, this is a very effective tool that works well in radar detection.
customer_reviews.author: Harbourbug

customer_reviews.title: A lot of false alarms
customer_reviews.text: It does what its supposed to do for the price. However, you start to notice how many false alarms this things gives on a daily basis is absurd. With that in mind, if you read the booklet and you spend enough time driving you get used to it. And soon you know when its a false alarm. So for those of you who have more money and less patience, i do not recommend. Get something more expensive, but if this is on a budget it will do its job diligently.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price, never let me down yet.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, I haven't had a ticket so far and passed many traffic officers. I was weary of having it on show all the time but no I have a sticky pad, if I ever get stopped , I whip it off and place a baoefung radio in its place. Its a pity it doesn't have a flush flat base as it would then be perfect for fitting to my motorbike dash too. However, it sits in the sun all day and does its job well. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Trosty

customer_reviews.title: I own two and both are great.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many, many radar detectors throughout the years, Cobra has never disappointed me. I love the intellimute feature for when it is picking up some bastard signal and your stopped somewhere, it makes you not go insane from the beeping, I can pick up the state police for miles when they are coming at me with the radar on, I have not had nay experience with laser so far so cannot review for that.
customer_reviews.author: BKG

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing and it goes off after I see a Police/sheriff vehicle. This thing works but my eyes work better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kinne

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with the Cobra XRS9370. For me it's used as a potential threat indicator. The police have some pretty advanced systems and a lot of them won't turn on radar until you are basically right next to them but my Cobra simply confirms this. I like to know what's going on around me and this helps with that. I'm not much of a speeder but it does get me to give a look down at my speedo to knock it down the extra 5-10 I might be going. Lots of functions to keep the driver happy and un-annoyed. Muting, Dimming, City/Highway... etc. Good mounting hardware. I definitely don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: mnflyboy

customer_reviews.title: ... Shack radar detector that the mute button had gone bad on. The must button on this unit works ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old Radio Shack radar detector that the mute button had gone bad on. The must button on this unit works which is good because it goes off constantly, sometimes for 30 miles, even on the city setting. I think it is responding to radar detectors in the cars around me, so it is pretty useless. The readout on the front is tiny and almost impossible to see in normal daytime lighting. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ophoff

customer_reviews.title: seems to work fine but
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work fine but the part where you see signal and type of signal already has began to burn out so 3 looks like backwards c 4 is kind of an h etc and the power cord is already messed up. So not the greatest but not the worst
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pring

customer_reviews.title: If it helps you pay more attention to your speed like it does for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this because I want to get away with speeding.You could be followed by an unmarked car without radar on and still get a ticket.I don't pay attention to my speed as much as I should.There are many false alarms that go off from electric doors etc.This helps me pay more attention to my speed.It does work when a radar is around.If it helps you pay more attention to your speed like it does for me,then it's worth it for that alone.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeake Bay Nick

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised Good product !
customer_reviews.text: paid for itself in one trip...bought a Porsche and figured I would need one...first road trip alerted to me to 3 speed traps... warned me on three different types of radar..in plenty of time to insure I was going the posted speed... and I have to say I enjoyed driving by two state cops in a 25 mph zone. at 25 mph .and the traffic behind probably got annoyed ...until they realized the speed trap and my slowing down saved them a ticket as well.
customer_reviews.author: maxman

customer_reviews.title: It warns you of Police, and keeps you alert to your speed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert about these, but so far it has warned me about police when they are present. No, I don't like to speed, but I got a ticket before, just because, I wasn't paying attention to my speed, and the street I was on, was 4 lane and 35mph, oh, what a surprise, oh, what a ticket!! I feel a lot more confident when I drive, it keeps you alert to your speed and where the police are hiding. The price of one ticket would pay for this, I can attest to that!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: nothing so far
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 1 star. I don't see how it works... 4 cops drove by me, this radar didn't do nothing.. saw one cop hiding under a tree.. radar didn't detect them. I've turned the device on and off and so fall all alerts it gets are speed limit Posts
customer_reviews.author: zaskia colon

customer_reviews.title: To me this thing has been amazing has saved my ass way more then once
customer_reviews.text: You know, seeing all these reviews everybodies experience vary. To me this thing has been amazing has saved my ass way more then once. I would of lost my license long ago lol. To me this is amazing but....... But there is better ones no doubt. But for me this is good. And this one works well for highways. That's what I noticed, to many things set it off in a town but highways this does excellent. So if your just driving around in a city big city. Then maybe look for a different one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Goes off whenever I get by a car with the mirror sensors. Doesn't light up so the screen is black constantly and is the worst one I've ever owned. Had previous one for 10 years and decided to upgrade. Wish I would have kept my old one because it worked better than this one!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Haven't got a ticket yet
customer_reviews.text: After getting 3 ticket in 3 months, I had to do something. (Not drive slower) I bought this havent gotten another ticket. It is very sensitive and goes off litterally miles from the radar. That can be annoying but when i see the cop, I cant complain. I took one star because it also detects other radar detectors. I've looked around and saw other people with radar detectors when mine goes off. Its detecting the pop gun in theirs. But its saved my behind many times!!
customer_reviews.author: Dane Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of a radar detector is to alert you with enough time to slow down. This thing constantly goes gives false alerts and does nothing when you need it. I was on the highway on a straight road and it did not go off until I was a few feet away from the cop and it ended up costing me a hefty ticket. Do yourself a favor and pay more for a real detector that will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This radar detector works great! It came earlier then expected too
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector works great! It came earlier then expected too. You have to read the instructions to set what bans you want or don't want it to pick up. It has great range also. You need to be aware of what false alerts are: example- parking lots will give off the k ban alert, as will speed reading signs. The typical police ban is the ka ban. I love the voice alert on this product. The only thing I don't like it the coiled cord and how short it is, but that doesn't stop the product from working great.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the Detector Detector.....
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade of a 3 year old Cobra that gave up the ghost when I dropped it. This model is similar to my first. A few more bells and whistles, it does the job as advertised. Had an ExPort back in the day, this low ender is up to the task+! (I'm a little hard of hearing, they need to tweet the volume up a decibel or three on the voice warning mode). Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Max Mustang

customer_reviews.title: Great radar for casual drivers
customer_reviews.text: We just finished a long road trip using this radar system. Accurately warned us of any radar traps and nearby police. Only one false alarm the whole trip. Perfect for the driver who likes to drive slightly above the speed limit or for drivers who like to be aware of their surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Seth O'Shee

customer_reviews.title: NO SPEEDING HERE
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this radar detector for my b-day so I can stop getting tickets. I been having this item since 2012 and it is still working. This radar really works. It detects cops 2 miles before you pass the cops. But the only thing I don't like is that It also detects all shopping stores doors even while you are driving on the freeway.HERE IS MY UPDATE ON THIS PRODUCT IT'S NOW 2016 AND MY RADAR DETECTOR HAS DIED DUE TO THE AZ SUN. IT PROBABLY WOULD OF LIVE MUCH LONGER IT I LIVED IN A COOLER CLIMATE.
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: This is a lifesaver if you like to go above the speed limit
customer_reviews.text: I ended up stealing this from my husband and had to buy him another. This is a lifesaver if you like to go above the speed limit. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fuzz Buster
customer_reviews.text: Great radar detector, loud and noticible even when i crank my aftermarket stereo system, got this when my exaust had a hole in it, and i didn't have the money to replace it but i had some spare gift card money. Got me out of so many possible speeding and other stupid tickets. i wasn't going to keep it after i did the exaust, but it's just so nice to have a fuzz buster.
customer_reviews.author: Azumaril

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the money. Has saved me from a few tickets and paid for itself already. I don't typically drive much over the speed limit, I just like to have an idea of when and where law enforcement is. Only problem I have is with false alerts when driving around newer vehicles that use radar for backup proximity sensors or lane alert systems. Some people seemed confused that it isn't a cop detector! Only detects vehicles with active radar, and for that it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: It really sounds and alerts to the police, so it is working and that is what counts. Good radar with the exception that we are receiving a lot of false highway readings. It seems to alert near every semi-truck. Over time we will learn the new radar pattern for our most traveled roads. Yes, we would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: The sounds that this one makes are less annoying and it does several bands that my previous one ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of Cobra radar detectors in the past, but the last one got eat up by the sun and elements. The sounds that this one makes are less annoying and it does several bands that my previous one did. It does seem to go crazy at a couple spots along my commute where there is no obvious reason to. It is clear that it sees something on the Ka band, just cannot tell what it is.
customer_reviews.author: fn-pauly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: First time user of a 'fuzz buster.' This unit seems to work VERY well. Is capable of many adjustments that can allow for less false alarms but they will still occur; better safe than sorry! Has saved my ass a few times HOWEVER, if a 'laser' is being used the alarm triggers once the 'laser' hits the 'fuzz buster.' That being said, one still must use their head and drive safe.
customer_reviews.author: Keibbler

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not pickup any radars from a distance, damn state trooper was on my butt going 100 mph following me and dam radar did not pick it up until he pulled me over, thanks Cobra for this junk!!
customer_reviews.author: 6IX

customer_reviews.title: Decently Priced Detector
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Does throw up false alarms but not very often. It's more often right than wrong so I've learned to trust it. Build quality is high and mounting the unit was a simple process. The only thing I could say is to make sure it can see out all windows. It does not work as well when placed too low on the windshield. So far it's probably saved me a few hundred bucks and it still works after the abuse I've put it through so I can certainly say this was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend as a gift. I've ridden around with him waiting for it to go off and it never does even when I see a radar gun pointed at us. The only time is does make any noises or notify us of anything is going by certain businesses. I don't know if they have some kind of door opening device etc, but something sets it off at the grocery store every time without fail. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H.F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I got speeding tickets twice within the past year by using this unit. Once it did not detect the police radar at all and the second time It only detected within few yards of the police and sure enough they had detected my speed way before this piece of junk alarmed me. It is not reliable at all. Too many false alarms...
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Great Detector!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I am not giving this detector 5 stars is because the cord is just a bit too short and I have had to attach a clip to my dash board to keep it from pulling sideways and falling in the floor. I do have it on a gel mat and that helps some, but the telephone coil card needs to be about 2 inches longer. My car is a new Santa Fe so it is not some giant vehicle. I ordered 2 and it also is short for my husbands Ram pickup. Other wise it is a GREAT device and very sensitive, picking up signals long before the traffic officers car is in view.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Henry

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective ,ordered 2 of them and one does not work we tried everything .so keep your box incase you need to return .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am giving this product 4 stars only because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 4 stars only because it did save me from a hefty speeding ticket about once or twice. I purchased this solely for highway driving since i travel a lot. I am constantly getting false alarms. What has saved me is that whether they are false or not, I always pay attention to the alerts and I just mute them if they're false and slow down when they're accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I haven't gotten a ticket yet but maybe I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I haven't gotten a ticket yet but maybe I'm being a bit cautious cause I know here the police use there speed guns Even so the voice alert are cool and does get your attention so far I've experience K Ka X so will update later on when I do get tag
customer_reviews.author: R.Nicome

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for the money. Occasional false alerts but one never really knows if it was false or something you just didn't see. Sure, it alerts you to some Walgreens & CVS's but most detectors do. I'm sure the more expensive ones are more accurate but this suits my needs. Given that the price of this unit is about half that of a speeding ticket using one of these is a no-brainer for me.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Ok....
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work much better than cheaper versions. Pretty much the same range
customer_reviews.author: Ayman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought a sports car and new that I would get myself into trouble if I wasn't careful. I've had the car and this detector for two years and still no speeding tickets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a device that has few if any ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a device that has few if any false alarms. The latter is important with all the cars driving around putting out signals from their bumpers!
customer_reviews.author: Rod Swartz

customer_reviews.title: The price is good but is not what I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: Is good for the price, but is detecting the signal too close.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio G.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and definitely the best bang for your buck. Has a small footprint which is also greatly reduced when you add the visor mount clip for under $10. Range tested equal or better against more expensive units.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Clark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't detect accurately
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on K, Ku, Ka bands and all that, tried all the settings, done a lot of driving to different cities, and it's not detecting cops just randomly goes off I guess from buildings and sometimes goes off crazy on the highway. I've driven by plenty of cops, seen cops, and rode by cops in all different bands and modes. It may have worked one time on the highway in highway mode but I'm not sure if Ka is for cops or what on this thing
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Extremely sensitive Con: Extremely sensitive I have another (lower priced model) Cobra that I like a lot. This model was ringing ALL the time, even in City mode, constant alarms made it useless. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudmaker

customer_reviews.title: It Seems To Work Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought This For My Girlfriends New Car. And, It Seems To Work Great!!! It Detects & Alerts Right Away, When There Is Law Enforcement & First Responders(Fire/Ambulance), Are In The The Area, Even Up In The Air.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Carver

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This Radar detector doesn't work on highway. It won't detect laser effectively. By the time it detects a radar, then it's too late. Will not recommend it. Got a ticket with this thing on and it couldn't detect the radar.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I have another Cobra type unit as well for the 2nd car and it isn't much better and that was a $120 unit
customer_reviews.text: I drive by speed cameras and it barely registers 1 bar of alarm...which normally you'd think it should be full alert. Too many false alarms as well. not impressed. I used to have a $40 walmart bought unit that was more accurate than this. I have another Cobra type unit as well for the 2nd car and it isn't much better and that was a $120 unit.
customer_reviews.author: sickpuppyz

customer_reviews.title: False alarms, worthless
customer_reviews.text: Totally way to many false alarms rendered it useless for me! I've owned this about a year and conclude it's useless on the interstate due to false alarms, mainly triggered by big rig trucks. It will detect police radar, the range is not good however due to so many false alarms is impossible to navigate real warnings from false.
customer_reviews.author: nuna

customer_reviews.title: Power cord not good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to reach you but power already bad. I have checked fuse as well. Just a dead cord. I bought nov 18. It should last more than six months.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kouba

customer_reviews.title: Great radar detector for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to think you had to spend a lot of money on a radar detector...but not anymore. This thing has saved me on a few occasions, and hasn't failed me yet. If you are a radar detector snob, it's probably not for you as there are quite a few false alarms, but I don't mind some false alarms if it saves me a few hundred dollars on a fancy radar detector.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lasater

customer_reviews.title: Horrible radar with very short range that you can't do ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible radar with very short range that you can't do anything when it beeps cuz it would be too late. Detection range is less than 100 meters & the false alarms are nonstop
customer_reviews.author: Abu Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Low signal strength
customer_reviews.text: Signal strength isn’t that great, you’ll get an alert anywhere from a block to 8 blocks away. Cops usually use Ka bands. I recommend saving your money for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: 2DaysOrYoure2Late

customer_reviews.title: DETECTOR DETECTS !!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this detector. It has not given a false signal to date and has saved me from myriad speed traps...I had an ancient Cobra that finally bit the dust and was uncertain if I would adapt to this one. Within a week I wouldn't think of leaving home without it being on! This is a must-have if you have a little lead in your foot :-) !! Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day! Picks up cops in plenty of time on the interstate. Just have to mute all the other channels besides the KA to ensure only a radar from the cops goes off. Great buy get it and save yourself a ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Lane LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Run run away far away
customer_reviews.text: I've been so disappointed in a radar detector. It does work and it picks up every single thing you could possibly imagine. You never know what is real and what is not with this detector. I would not recommend this to my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: WGR

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't! Waste of money. It informs me if there's a Home Depot around or if someone has adaptive cruise control, but very rarely if there is a police officer. It just goes off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: E. RABE

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the Buck under $110 review sold me
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews on detectors before I bought this. Best bang for the Buck under $110 review sold me. I never drive without one. This unit replaced a 20 year old one.
customer_reviews.author: Geneflem

customer_reviews.title: It is much cheaper than a speeding ticket
customer_reviews.text: This unit is much cheaper than a speeding ticket and has saved my bacon a number of times. You have to respond quickly though when the unit alerts you to the radar. I live in the mountains and several times the CHP was coming towards me around the next bend barely giving me enough time to reduce my speed enough to not be noticed.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID HANSON

customer_reviews.title: Need this in FL. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to Florida, and I needed one of these to help me speed without getting caught. Everybody in FL drives like a maniac so I needed this fit right in. It does have quite a few false alarms, but works when there are cops.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Math

customer_reviews.title: Goes off near Audi's
customer_reviews.text: So this works great to pickup KA band but the K alert goes off if there is an Audi driving by.
customer_reviews.author: Man Rat

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed, my husband was really looking forward to having ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product does not work. I can say it with certainty now, we have passed dozens of cops and it doesn't beep/notify. I'm disappointed, my husband was really looking forward to having one.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Screen went out after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: The Radar detector still has sound, but the screen slowly stop showing up when radar was detected; within a few months of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilee South

customer_reviews.title: Nice detector, light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Like all detectors it does what it says it does. Not really had a real chance to test it on a highway yet. Town driving with the auto mute function is cool, that beeping constantly gets on your nerves. This is a good feature and so is the strength indicator of radar signal. so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: which can seem like a false positive until you see them
customer_reviews.text: This detector works extremely well, and I have never had any issues with it. Sometimes it picks up cops from quite a ways away, which can seem like a false positive until you see them. It can also pick up automatic door sensors when driving through town as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graham

customer_reviews.title: I once was blind but now I see
customer_reviews.text: This detector can detect radar from a mile away! I used to have one of these years ago, same brand, voice alert, and it was no where near the power of this one. It picks up signals of many kinds, over hills, around corners, behind buildings, and I am serious an estimated mile away! GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cord and mount. False alarms
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a while now, the cord broke and the suction cups never held it in place. Picked up false alarms all the time and wasn’t of much use. Now it collects dust. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: brandon balmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these for my vehicles. Too Many K radar alerts, I wish you could turn those off, but it has saved me several times with KA detection. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, easy to set up, fairly accurate, has already saved me from a few speeding tickets. Sometimes it kind of goes off annoyingly especially one time when it was raning it just wouldn't shut up had to unplug it but for the amount of money it has saved me its definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bad reviews are correct:  this is a useless device -  beeps ALL the time, very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Bad reviews are correct: this is a useless device - beeps ALL the time, very annoying. My 8 year old Cobra works a lot better than this one. I can not believe how they manage to sell something so useless. Bought, got it, returned within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Diminich

customer_reviews.title: It picks up everything. I mean everything out there.
customer_reviews.text: Seems it is going off all the time. It has helped for sure.Just not sure about all the different beeps and buzzers. I need to really study this thing so when it beeps or buzzes I know which band it is sensing.
customer_reviews.author: M. V. Damiano

customer_reviews.title: which were very good. But have retired them
customer_reviews.text: Niiiiccceeee! beats my old Whistler 1125; Was ready for an upgrade anyways. I've owned a couple old Cobra CB's, which were very good. But have retired them. Thank You Cobra Digital!
customer_reviews.author: Imagine That

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for commuters
customer_reviews.text: This was my first radar detector. I picked it up after I started a long daily commute. It took a week or two to learn how to use it, but now that I have the hang of it, I don't like to drive without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholles Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure it is not working
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work as advertised. The city, highway light never changes. It always shows the number 8. The small numbers never light up. It hardly ever makes a sound. It only makes 3 beeps when it is turned on and that is it. I'm pretty sure it is not working. I would like to know how much of a hassle it would be to send it back and get it replaced with one that works.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Not detecting
customer_reviews.text: Very first day using it, had given me two false positives and I was passing an officer who was running radar and it made no alerts. Granted I was going a few MPH over the limit, he didnt pull out to stop me. I had it set on city mode but I may be doing something wrong. any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Appius

customer_reviews.title: Trusted name in protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife though I have noticed while driving her car how cool this thing is. Very easy operation, mounts great with the suction cups and did not give off any false alarms. I like how the first initials alarms are loud then they get quieter if it's not the real thing. Good price made this an easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: Evan J

customer_reviews.title: false alarms after false alarms. Does not seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: false alarms after false alarms. Does not seem to matter if a signal is near.
customer_reviews.author: W3BY

customer_reviews.title: Too Quiet...
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, almost impossible to hear if you have music playing. Also has a fairly dim display. Not effective at giving you enough notice to slow down quickly because of those 2 issues. If I had kept the packaging, I would have returned it... Used it once and now it sits collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Brown

product_meta.title: Cobra XRS9370 High-Performance Radar/Laser Detector with 360-Degree Protection
product_meta.description: Style:XRS9370| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Cobra XRS 9370 14 band radar/laser detector with UltraBright data display, has an ultra compact design with an improved range for high performance with refined style. The XRS 9370 features a digital signal strength meter to provide relative proximity to the target, city/highway selector to reduce the frequency of falsing in densely populated urban areas, auto mute, dimmer for night time use, LaserEye 360 degree detection, KU Band Detection, VG-2 undetectable/alert, Spectre1 undetectable/alert, Safety Alert warns driver of emergency vehicles and road hazards from system equipped with Safety Alert transmitters, and a memory function. This product is FCC Compliant.
feature_bullets: Superfast sweep circuitry provides extra detection range and the best possible advanced warning to even the fastest radar guns.
Pop Mode detects the latest Radar Gun POP
VG-2 and Spectre Alert, alerts the user when they are under the surveillance of a VG2 or Spectre I/IV+ Radar detector-detectors
City/ Highway modes allow the user to select operating mode which reduces the frequency of falsing in densely populated urban areas
Compact unit detects all 14 radar/laser bands at greater range than its predecessor
Super-fast sweep circuitry provides extra detection range and the best possible advanced warning to even the fastest radar guns
VG-2 radar detector-detector undetectable; alert lets the user know when they are under the surveillance of a VG-2 device
City/ Highway modes allow the user to select operating mode which reduces the frequency of falsing in densely populated urban areas
UltraBright data display provides easy recognition of band detected by use of band identification icons
KU Band Detection mode detects the Ku Band Radar Gun currently being used in Europe. Be ready when it comes to the U.S.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,450 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
